CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 悲剧；悲剧作品；灾难；惨剧；惨事；不幸；不幸事件；悲惨经历

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 悲剧的；悲剧性的；悲惨的；不幸的

bilingual.source: Hamlet is a tragedy written by William Shakespeare.
bilingual.target: 《哈姆雷特》是威廉·莎士比亚写的悲剧。
这场事故是一场巨大的悲剧。

bilingual.source: We do not want the tragedy to repeat itself.

bilingual.target: 这部电影是一部令人心碎的悲剧。

bilingual.source: She lost her faith after the tragedy.
bilingual.target: 在那场悲剧之后，她失去了信仰。

bilingual.source: The sinking of the Titanic was a tragedy.
bilingual.target: 泰坦尼克号的沉没是一个悲剧。

bilingual.source: Their love story was doomed to be a tragedy.
bilingual.target: 他们的爱情故事注定是悲剧。

bilingual.source: The book tells the story of a family tragedy.
bilingual.target: 这本书讲述了一场家庭悲剧。

bilingual.source: The story of Oedipus is a classic tragedy.
bilingual.target: 俄狄浦斯的故事是一部经典悲剧。

bilingual.source: He couldn't accept the occurrence of the tragedy.
bilingual.target: 他无法接受这场悲剧的发生。

list.abstract: Tragedy，英文单词，本义是指灾难。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, I'm sorry to hear about your tragedy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的悲剧令我同情。

yingyinNormal.en: Mufasa's death is a terrible tragedy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 木法沙的死亡是个可怕的悲剧。

yingyinNormal.en: Tragic? But, then again, one man's tragedy is another man's treasure, isn't that right? Trash.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真悲剧？但话又说回来，一个人的悲剧是另一个人的宝藏，是不是？垃圾。

yingyinNormal.en: End of story. No bird. That to me is an absolute tragedy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 再就没有后续了，没有大鸟了。对我来说那简直就是悲剧。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a tragedy, no other way to put it. Such a beautiful day, too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 彻底悲剧，没别的形容方式了。本来多美好的一天。

yingyinNormal.en: The Great Khan offers a parley to avert further tragedy and discuss peaceful arbitration.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为了避免悲剧升级，共商和平，大汗要求和谈。

yingyinNormal.en: Jeffrey Grant was a tragedy. We had an ASA who was looking to make his bones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 杰弗里·格兰特案是个悲剧，我们有个想崭露头角的助理州检察官。

yingyinNormal.en: It is a tragedy that the fates will not allow him the time to bear witness to the fall of Kublai Khan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 命运让他无法亲眼见证忽必烈的覆灭，真是悲剧。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a tragedy. $2 million. $500,000. $1 million and it's a drop in the bucket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真是个悲剧。两百万。五十万。一百万，这对你们来说是九牛一毛。

yingyinNormal.en: Why is it sick? Because it's Richard's son. It's like inviting Greek tragedy over for dinner.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么变态？因为他是理查的儿子，这跟找希腊悲剧来吃饭一样。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, back to the matter in hand. Coffin. Problem, someone is about to die. It will be, as I understand it, a tragedy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 回到正题。棺材。问题，有人要死了。就我所知，这会是个悲剧。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, he died. Here in the park. His personal life was marked by tragedy. He put all his hopes into his work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他死了，就死在乐园里，他的个人生活烙上了悲剧色彩，他把所有的希望都寄托在工作上。

yingyinNormal.en: It's odd, isn't it? We witnessed a tragedy today but, sitting here with your arm around me, I can't remember feeling so comfortable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真奇怪啊？我们今天目睹了一场悲剧，但坐在你的臂弯里，我不记得比这更惬意的感觉了。

yingyinNormal.en: Is this about Callan? It was a tragedy. If he hadn't been trying so hard to win your approval, he might still be with us. Medivh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是因为卡伦？这是一个悲剧，如果他没有努力尝试来赢得你的认可，他可能仍然和我们在一起。麦迪文。

yingyinNormal.en: Aristotle defined tragedy as a terrible outcome arising from a person's fatal flaw. A flaw, that had it been fixed, would have instead led to a wonderful outcome.
yingyinNormal.zh: 亚里士多德将悲剧定义成个人致命缺点带来的可怕结果。当初要是改善了这个缺点，结果就会大大变好。

yingyinNormal.en: Source Code is not time travel. Rather, Source Code is time reassignment. It gives us access to a parallel reality. Now the deaths on the train were a tragedy, but Source Code empowers us…
yingyinNormal.zh: 源代码不是时间穿梭，而是对时间的再赋值，它能让我们进入与现实平行的世界。车上人的遇难是个悲剧，但是源代码使我们…

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not denying what happened to the Millers. It was a tragedy. No, but you are. Because denying it is the tragedy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不否认米勒一家的遭遇是个惨剧。不 ，你在否认，否认它就是惨剧。

yingyinNormal.en: They lost their seven-year-old son, Ben, in the Sandy Hook tragedy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在桑迪岬惨案中他们失去了年仅七岁的儿子本。

yingyinNormal.en: If it wasn't such a tragedy, it would've been funny. Actually, it kind of was.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果不是那么悲惨的话，应该会很有意思，事实上，是有些好笑。

yingyinNormal.en: And let's work together to end the tragedy of homelessness among veterans once and for all.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我们一起努力彻底结束退伍军人中无家可归的惨剧。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 悲剧性事件；惨事；惨剧；惨案；灾难；悲剧作品；悲剧

word_family.mean: adj. 悲惨的；可悲的；悲痛的；悲剧作品的

sense_info_list.en: a serious play with a sad ending, especially one in which the main character dies; plays of this type

examination_example.sentence: Kyd had written a <highlight>tragedy</highlight> that crowded the pit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基德已经写出了一部让剧场爆满的悲剧。

examination_example.sentence: Europe was witnessing the passing of the religious drama, and the creation of new forms under the incentive of classical <highlight>tragedy</highlight> and comedy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 欧洲正在见证宗教戏剧的消亡，和在传统悲剧和喜剧的刺激下的新形式的创造。

sense_info_list.en: an event causing great suffering, destruction, and

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 悲剧性事件；惨事；惨剧；惨案；灾难；悲剧作品；悲剧

word_family.mean: adj. 悲惨的；可悲的；悲痛的；悲剧作品的

sense_info_list.en: a play dealing with tragic events and having an unhappy ending, especially one concerning the downfall of the main character

examination_example.sentence: Because universities and curricula are designed along the three unities of French classical <highlight>tragedy</highlight>： time, action, and place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为大学和课程的设计遵循法国古典悲剧的三个统一：时间、行动和地点。

examination_example.sentence: Yet take a closer look, and the diploma is the perfect ending to the modem <highlight>tragedy</highlight> of education.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而仔细看看，文凭是现代教育悲剧的完美结局。

sense_info_list.en: an event causing great suffering, destruction, and

examination_example.sentence: We need very broad participation to fully address the global <highlight>tragedy</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们需要非常广泛的参与，以充分应对这场全球灾难。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 悲剧性事件；惨事；惨剧；惨案；灾难；悲剧作品；悲剧

word_family.mean: adj. 悲惨的；可悲的；悲痛的；悲剧作品的

sense_info_list.en: an event causing great suffering; destruction; and

examination_example.sentence: Careme's childhood was one part <highlight>tragedy</highlight>, equal part mystery.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Careme 的童年是悲剧的一部分，也是神秘的一部分。

examination_example.sentence: Carême's childhood was one part <highlight>tragedy</highlight>, equal part mystery.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 卡梅的童年一部分是悲剧，一部分是神秘。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>tragedy</highlight> is that he didn't follow his own advice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 悲剧在于他没有听从自己的建议。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 悲剧; 惨案; 悲惨的事

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 悲剧; 惨案; 悲惨的事

exam_freq_info.chinese: 悲剧; 惨案; 悲惨的事

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 悲剧; 惨案; 悲惨的事

examination_example.sentence: Although the film is a comedy, it also has some <highlight>tragedy</highlight>, reflecting Chaplin's own life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然这部电影是一部喜剧，但它也有一些悲剧，反映了卓别林自己的生活。

examination_example.sentence: As there is no gravity, you can't stand and any slight push can result in <highlight>tragedy</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于没有重力，你无法站立，而且任何轻微的推搡都可能导致悲剧。
